Phone Number Found.Critical: Phone number NOT listed; A working, updated phone number must be present in your profile to give potential customers a way to get in touch-- this is essential for getting leads

Hours in Operation.Critical: Hours in Operation NOT specified; Listing your operating hours lets customers know if you're available or when is the best time to visit, or if you're open on holidays or your seasonal hours.

Business Description.Looking Good: Business title and description are found
Business Description.Critical: Business title and description are NOT found; Business title and description to give customers useful information on your business services and products, including history of your business.

Business Category.Critical: Business category NOT found; Categories help your describe your core business to customers; they must be as specific as possible, but representative of your main business

Services Offered.Looking Good: Business attributes further define servicability options for your customers

URLDomain.Critical: No URL/Domain found; The website represents your individual business location

Google Business Profile Verified.Critical: Google Business Profile is NOT Verified

Minimum 3 business photos.Looking Good: Number of Business Photos are acceptable
Minimum 3 business photos.Critical: Number of Business Photos are below acceptable; Business photos summarize the business and what it can do for its customers including photos of exterior and interior of your business location and your products/goods

Post Found.Looking Good: Number of Google post is optimized
Post Found.For Improvement: Google posts unoptimized (phone stuffing or other content that violates GBP content policies found)

Minimum Post.Looking Good: More then 5 post found in last 30 days
Minimum Post.For Improvement: Post are found but only2 post in last 30 days
Minimum Post.Critical: No Post found in last 30 days

Images in Post.Looking Good: Images of the business/products present and optimized

Review Score.Looking Good: Reviews found, with review less than 3 months old
Review Score.For Improvement: Reviews found, no reviews in the last 3 months
Review Score.Critical: No reviews found; Reviews are vital to building trust with your customers. Encourage customers to leave detailed reviews on Google- reviews will drive more business your way

Ave Review.Critical: Average reviews 3 stars or lower; Low to middling reviews possibly turn away potential customers, it's best to get in touch with your customers to find opportunities to improve customer experience

Owner Response.For Improvement: Some reviews have replies by the owner
Owner Response.Critical: No owner responses to reviews found
